languages.text: "Это и есть то место, откуда мы сможем выбраться на волю? Не терпится... не терпится убраться отсюда подальше... поверить не могу, что я это говорю, но — как же хочется увидеть настоящее солнце взамен этих бледных немочей среди шпилей!"

"So that's our way out, eh? Can't wait... I can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale feeble things among the spires!"
languages.original_text: "Это и есть то место, откуда мы сможем выбраться на волю? Не терпится... не терпится убраться отсюда подальше... поверить не могу, что я это говорю, но — как же хочется увидеть настоящее солнце взамен этих бледных немочей среди шпилей!"

traits.locale_text: "So that's our way out, huh? Can't wait... can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this, but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale, sickly things among the spires!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that's our way out, huh? Can't wait... can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this, but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale, sickly things among the spires!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that's our way out, huh? Can't wait... can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale retches among the spires!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that's our way out, huh? Can't wait... can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale retches among the spires!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that's our way out, eh? Can't wait... I can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale feeble things among the spires!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that's our way out, eh? Can't wait... I can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale feeble things among the spires!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Alors, c'est ça, notre porte de sortie ? J'ai hâte de foutre le camp très loin d'ici... Je ne pensais pas dire ça un jour, mais je meurs d'envie de voir un vrai soleil, et pas juste ces rayons blafards entre les tours ! »
languages.original_text: "So that's our way out, eh? Can't wait... I can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale feeble things among the spires!"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, c'est ça, notre porte de sortie ? J'ai vraiment hâte... de foutre le camp très loin d'ici... Je ne pensais pas dire ça un jour, mais j'ai vraiment envie de voir un vrai soleil, et pas juste ces rayons blafards entre les tours ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “这就是我们的出路，嗯？我已经等不及……等不及想要离开这里了。我真不敢相信我会说出这种话，但我真的很想看到真正的恒星，不想再看到尖塔之间那些惨白的怪东西了！”
languages.original_text: "So that's our way out, eh? Can't wait... I can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale feeble things among the spires!"

traits.locale_text: “这就是我们的出路，对吗？我已经等不及……等不及想要离开这里了。我真不敢相信我会说出这种话，但我真的很想看到真正的恒星，不想再看到尖塔之间那些惨白的怪东西了！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あそこが出口なのね？ああもう…早くここから遠くへ離れたいわ…こんなこと言うなんて自分でも信じられないんだけど、本物の太陽が見たくてたまらないのよ。あんな尖塔にいた弱々しいものじゃなくてね！」
languages.original_text: "So that's our way out, eh? Can't wait... I can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale feeble things among the spires!"

traits.locale_text: 「あそこが出口なのね？ああもう…早くここから遠くへ離れたいわ…こんなこと言うなんて自分でも信じられないんだけど、本物の太陽が見たくてたまらないのよ。あんな尖塔にいた弱々しいものじゃなくてね！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist also unser Weg raus, ja? Ich kann's kaum erwarten ... wirklich kaum erwarten, so weit wie möglich von hier wegzukommen ... Schon komisch, dass ich das so sage, aber ich will endlich wieder eine echte Sonne sehen und nicht diese traurig-faden Kopien über den Türmen!"
languages.original_text: "So that's our way out, eh? Can't wait... I can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale feeble things among the spires!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist also unser Weg raus, was? Ich kann es kaum erwarten ... wirklich kaum erwarten, so weit wie möglich von hier wegzukommen ... Schon komisch, dass ist das so sage, aber ich will endlich wieder eine echte Sonne sehen und nicht diese traurig-faden Kopien über den Türmen!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Conque ese es nuestro billete de salida, ¿eh? No puedo esperar... estoy deseando que nos vayamos muy lejos de aquí... ¡No puedo creer que diga esto, pero me muero por ver un sol de verdad, y no esas luces macilenta que rodean las torres!».
languages.original_text: "So that's our way out, eh? Can't wait... I can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale feeble things among the spires!"

traits.locale_text: «Conque ese es nuestro billete de salida, ¿eh? No puedo esperar... estoy deseando que nos vayamos muy lejos de aquí... ¡No puedo creer que diga esto, pero me muero por ver un sol de verdad, y no esa luz macilenta que parecen vomitar las propias torres!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Demek çıkış yolumuz bu ha? Buradan uzaklaşmak için sabırsızlanıyorum. Bunu söylediğime inanamıyorum ama şu an kulelerin arasındaki şu solgun ve güçsüz şeyler yerine gerçek bir güneş görmeyi gerçekten çok isterdim!"
languages.original_text: "So that's our way out, eh? Can't wait... I can't wait to get far away from here... I can't believe I'm saying this but I really want to see a real sun, not those pale feeble things among the spires!"

traits.locale_text: "Demek çıkış yolumuz bu ha? Buradan uzaklaşmak için sabırsızlanıyorum. Bunu söylediğime inanamıyorum ama şu an kulelerin arasındaki şu solgun ve güçsüz şeyler yerine gerçek bir güneş görmeyi gerçekten çok istiyorum!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
